description.displayText:
Valarie was amazing to say the least. She was attentive to detail, she was creative in meal prep and developed a meaningful and loving relationship with our daughter. We would have LOVED to continue having Valarie with us but unfortunately our schedules did not align.
I 1000 percent recommend Valarie !
description.originalText:
Valarie was amazing to say the least. She was attentive to detail, she was creative in meal prep and developed a meaningful and loving relationship with our daughter. We would have LOVED to continue having Valarie with us but unfortunately our schedules did not align.
I 1000 percent recommend Valarie !

description.displayText:
Valerie has been the best nanny we've ever had. She is always punctual, willing to change her schedule if needed and accommodating to us. She cared for my two boys ages 1 and 3. She does educational activities with them
and my 3 year old especially has learned a lot including reading, writing, counting to 100 and number recognition. She was also able to get my 1 year old off of the baby bottle even when I couldn't do it. He's learned body parts and animal sounds with her.  She encompasses all that you would need and want in a caregiver for your child. I trust her and never had to worry when my kids were with her. The only reason she is no longer with us is because we moved out of state otherwise I would have been happy to still have her.
